806760.name: Departure
806760.description:
Features:
  • A mature combination of mystery and horror
  • Inspired by the first Silent Hill game, rich in a branching storyline
  • Freedom of exploration: fight or flight, do whatever you can to survive

Description:
There are zones in this world you know nothing about because they have been classified by the government. They are zones where things that defy the laws of nature and common sense are happening. Zones nobody comes back from.



You are a glorified guard of such a zone, hired by a secret agency. One day the zone goes full paranormal – with you inside. Surrounded by dangerous anomalies and hunted by monsters during the night, you have to decide whether to fight, or flee and pray for dawn.

EXPLORE, DISCOVER, SURVIVE.

Departure takes place in a large forest full of interesting places and seriously weird stuff to discover. You can go wherever and do whatever but be aware that the inescapable storyline will find you no matter what. And most likely it will be a violent encounter.




During the night you try to survive and solve the mystery of this place. During the day you gather necessary items and supplies, taking advantage of the fact that there are no monsters around. Aside from weapons, you have a drone at your disposal. Use it wisely.
